feed.title: Category: Mega Man X1 | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Mega Man X1 (SNES, 1993) (6)
entry.content:
I got past Vile, but had a heck of a time getting up the wall with the flying platformers... it was so painful. I feel like I'm really letting my kids down when they watch me and expect awesomeness.

Total time: 5:23

entry.title: Game: Mega Man X1 (SNES, 1993) (5)
entry.content:
I spent a lot of time trying to get the Hadouken today. I eventually got it, but I find it almost impossible to use because you need to be at full health. I got to the Spider in Sigma's fortress, but couldn't get past it.

Total time: 4:52

entry.title: Game: Mega Man X1 (SNES, 1993) (4)
entry.content:
I played again quite a lot today. I think all that is left is Armored Armadillo and two heart tanks (before moving on to Sigma's fortress.) This game is soooo good.

Total time: 3:34

entry.title: Game: Mega Man X1 (SNES, 1993) (3)
entry.content:
We played again from the start for about an hour. This time I beat Chill Penguin, then went against Flame Mammoth (because I thought he'd be weak, but he wasn't), then we went to Sting Chameleon's stage and got the Armor upgrade. I'm not sure if I will use the password next time we play. Fighting the armor upgrade guard was te----dious!

Total time: 1:28

entry.title: Game: Mega Man X1 (SNES, 1993) (2)
entry.content:
Today my son and I played for about twenty minutes. We did the Intro stage and then Chill Penguin. We got the dash and got to the boss, but died on the first time and were out of lives. He wanted to play Launch Octopus again so we did that had a tough time with the ships before it was time for breakfast.

Total time: 0:37
